intro: Laser stevenii, commonly known as the Steven’s laser, is a striking flowering plant native to the southwestern United States. It features showy, spiky red or orange flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. The plant has a compact, bushy growth habit with gray-green foliage that adds visual interest throughout the growing season. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping. Its unique appearance and drought tolerance make it a standout in arid landscapes.
